prompt: A rare card from the Celestial Empires theme. This card features a Stellar Monarch named Nebula Sovereign. The art shows a majestic, regal figure made of swirling, iridescent nebula clouds and cosmic dust. The monarch's presence radiates an aura of power, with star-filled eyes and a crown made of glowing constellations. The background showcases a vibrant, ethereal nebula with stars and galaxies in the distance, creating a sense of awe and cosmic mystique. The image is detailed and bright, capturing the grandeur and mystical essence of the Nebula Sovereign who rules over the stars.
